preamble.longtitle: An Act to protect horses, asses and mules against cruel tethering; and for purposes connected therewith.
preamble.enactment: Be it enacted by the Queen's most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, and Commons, in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows

content.leaf: Offence of cruel tethering.In section 1 of the [1911 c.27.] Protection of Animals Act 1911 there shall be added in subsection (1) the following words after paragraph (e)
This Act may be cited as the Protection against Cruel Tethering Act 1988.
This Act shall come into force at the end of the period of two months beginning with the day on which it is passed.
